attributes.review: This app crashed so many times. There were bugs all over it, it also turned my phone off. Had to delete it in the end, I would not recommend it.
attributes.title: Donald Trump App is NOT Great

attributes.review:
Horrible app. Functionality needs work. UX experience is horrible. Full of fascism and misogyny. 

This app drained my phone of its first amendment rights. Limited access to my phone for my non-white friends and family. Simply doesn’t promote justice.
attributes.title: Un-American

attributes.review: You thought Bush was bad, just wait for president Trump. Not only is he completely incompetent, but he actively takes action to make America worse. He could not even come up with his own campaign slogan. He is racist, islamophobic, anti-Semitic and sexist.
attributes.title: Worst One Yet

attributes.review: This is the worst app to ever exists on this earth! I was very disappointed that I had to look at the most disgusting person on the planet more then once. 🤮 I’ll pass I highly recommend not getting this app 👎🏽🤮
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: First of all when I downloaded the app it took forever and over heated my iPad. Then after for sometime my iPad reached over and smacked me in the face!! I was so appalled i was almost paralyzed with shock and then she walked away and suplexed my mom 😭😭 TERRIBLE app hate it
attributes.title: Terrible App!

attributes.review: I opened the app to see a ugly orange 🍊! The fact that it said make America great again made me angry because it is worst ever since trump got elected! 😠😤 this app is absolutely terrible! I would not recommend having this app! Waste of time😤
attributes.title: Terrible 😡

attributes.review: It was terrible my dog took one look at the screen be mistake and went completely blind. Everyday it induces unimaginable nausea. Also as part of a more healthy diet plan it’s best to fully cut out all cheetos.
attributes.title: Horrible🤢 completely awful 🤮

attributes.review: I decided to get this app to show my support I went on the app and I went into a coma after seeing a naked picture of hot Cheeto boy then I woke up and showed my sister and she passed out and is now on the floor next to meI showed my mom and well her funeral is tomorrow
attributes.title: Hot Cheeto boy

attributes.review: i opened this app and instantly got offended there is no way in hell this should even be a thing. the people of america need more than a cheeto as a president and i can’t sand by someone who is trying to take down the youth of the world.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP

attributes.review: this app is not what i was expecting at all. it had an immense amount of bugs, and it came to the point in which i was unable to utilize this application. furthermore, the app is quite difficult to navigate. even my 13 year old daughter was unable to figure it out, and you know how these teens are with technology! overall extremely dissatisfied. will not be leaving a good review.
attributes.title: very disappointed 😔
